member.name: T:Waher.Runtime.Text.Difference
member.summary: Computes the difference between two sequences of symbols.

member.name: M:Waher.Runtime.Text.Difference.Analyze``1(``0[],``0[])
member.summary: Analyzes two sequences of symbols to estimate the difference between them.
member.remarks: Method searches for the shortest path in changing to . Costs are 0, if keeping a symbol: Cost of inserting or deleting a symbol is 1, if first symbol, or same operation as previous symbol, or 2, if chaning operation. The reason for this is to avoid altering inserts and deletions when blocks are changed.

member.summary: Analyzes two text strings, estimating the difference between them.

member.summary: Analyzes two texts, estimating the difference between them, as a sequence of rows.
